name: NFT Discord Bot
description: A Twitter/Discord bot for getting NFT data from Solana MarketPlaces

HOW_RARE_IS.description: URL to the collection on your howrare.is page. Please include trailing slash.

BOT_NAME.description: **Required if discord webhook enabled**. Pretty self explanatory

BOT_AUTHOR.description: **Required if discord webhook enabled**. Pretty self explanatory

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: **Required if discord enabled**. Pretty self explanatory

DISCORD_SALES_CHANNEL_ID.description: **Required if discord enabled**. The discord channel id where sales events should be posted to, should look like a long number

DISCORD_LISTING_CHANNEL_ID.description: **Required if discord enabled**. The discord channel id where listing events should be posted to, should look like a long number

DISCORD_OPTIONAL_CHANNEL_ID.description: The discord channel id where you can also send sales updates to based on a threshold value

PRICE_THRESHOLD.description: **Required if optional discord channel enabled**. Number to trigger posting to the optional channel.

DISCORD_TOKEN_COMMAND.description: The command word you'd like the bot to respond to for posting token information, pick a simple word that represents the collection.  Default: token

TWITTER_TIMEOUT_MS.description: **Required if twitter enabled**. Set interval to frequency of bot runs / polling for twitter bot in ms

TWITTER_API_KEY.description: **Required if twitter enabled**. Consumer API key for twitter

TWITTER_API_SECRET.description: **Required if twitter enabled**. Consumer API secret for twitter

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: **Required if twitter enabled**. Twitter access tokent

TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET.description: **Required if twitter enabled**. Twitter access secret

TWITTER_HASTAGS.description: Optional. Hashtags to add to the end of the tweet comma seperated. Include the # symbol
